definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-

sentences.english: Long-promised financial reforms are being proposed.
sentences.chinese: 之前承諾的金融改革正在擬議。

sentences.english: There are a number of good information-gathering initiatives in the works.
sentences.chinese: 有一些擬議中的很好的收集信息的項目。

sentences.english: I concure with the terms proposed.
If so, you meet the criteria for theproposed new condition of "binge eating disorder".
sentences.chinese: 如果是的話，你滿足擬議的新診斷“暴食症”的標準。

sentences.english: Many existing tariffs are already below the maximums in the proposed agreement.
sentences.chinese: 許多現行關稅已經低於擬議協議的最高限額。

sentences.english: The proposed tourism and recreation facilities are appropriate in developing the proposed Fisherman's Wharf Development within Aberdeen Harbour.
sentences.chinese: 擬議的旅遊和娛樂設施適合發展香港仔旅遊項目。

sentences.english: Divesting should be completed within six months from closure of the proposed transaction.
sentences.chinese: 剝離應在擬議交易完成後的六個月內完成。

sentences.english: Say Congress is considering a proposed federal cause of action for libel on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 說國會正在考慮擬議的聯邦訴訟因由誹謗在互聯網上。

sentences.english: It is difficult to imagine the proposed amendments failing anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 很難想象擬議的修正案在任何地方失敗。

sentences.english: About 4 km long waterfront promenade connecting Central to North Point.
sentences.chinese: 連接中環至北角長約4公里的擬議海濱長廊。

sentences.english: The proposed treaty would not to ban the sale of conventional arms.
sentences.chinese: 這項擬議中的條約並不會禁止常規武器交易。

definition: to lend money (for interest)/to give credit
(of a sum of money etc) receivable
to reduce payment/to annul (debts, bills, taxes etc)/to let sb off paying
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
China watcher/an expert on China/an old China hand
to have exclusive selling rights/to be the sole agent for a production unit or firm
